name: BoxEngine
description: Control your little box with your own rhythm - it will be a different experience~
minimum_requirements: OS: x64 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4  or AMD Athlon X2 @ 2.8 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB DirectX11（Shader Model 5） Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: normal
recommended_requirements: OS: x64 Processor: Intel Core 4 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: normal
